mikebrew Blog Docs

Code Snippets

Build robust, modern documentation sites with the Manual theme.

GET STARTED 
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/TheOtterlord/manual
# Navigate to the directory
cd manual
# Install dependencies
npm install
# Start the dev server
npm run dev

Build Your Project!
